description: The Rambler® 177 ml Stackable Mugs are just the right size for a flat white on the deck and a cortado at camp. Plus, its DuraSip™ Ceramic Lining, over-engineered firm-grip handle, and stackability make it ideal for espresso machines, camp kitchens, and beyond.
name: Rambler 177ml / 6oz Espresso Mug - 2 Pack

specs.value: Designed to fit under most espresso machines
